data.detailedDescription:
**If you read this in a whispering voice, it will make this even more fun**

Starting in 2009, audio sensory meridian response became increasingly popular, and for a good reason. It was novel, relaxing, and apparently has a positive impact on mental health. Of course, human beings being what they are, this form of therapy and entertainment soon became pornographic, and I have to say some perverts have done a fine job producing this sort of smut, too. But the problem remains as to where you can find it.

I do not know about you, but I used to think that this type of adult entertainment was hard to find. Naturally, I had to do a little research, finding spots in cyberspace that hosts good ASMR smut en mass for the purpose of my site. When I did, I found a mixture of good and 'meh' platforms.

Which is Fap House? Continue reading on to find out.

We Will Begin With The Total Selection Of Sexy Sounding Vids

Other creators, which I would recommend, include Glamour Buddies, which has a decent collection of carnal entertainment in this category. (They also have some of the hardest to otherwise find British babes in porn, too.) Another studio you should look into is Quinta Dimension which stood out to me for its psychedelic-inspired, almost trippy videos.

But it is not just the bigger studios that it would be in your best interest to pay attention to. There are a fine number of indie porn performers and producers who are worth looking at as well. For instance, Bette Davis is a devilishly delightful dame who specializes in erotica of the ASMR type. If you like bigger broads that also cater to this category, then look no further than the creations of Jessica Rabbit FinDom Goal Digger. Erotic Art by Soft Approach does ASMR vids which are all close-ups of extremely sensual and "sloppy" blowjobs in picturesque soft lighting.

And you must, must look up the ASMR raunch romps by Goddess Misha Goldy. While that might sound like a grand name, even by porn standards, she really does live up to the moniker, what with her honey-colored hair, eastern Euro accent, and the god-tier level at which she creates kinky, whispery content. She also mixes this sort of smut with hypnotism fetish footage as well, which I am sure is going to be a fact that is tremendously appreciated by many of you.

Moving onto the length, there is a decent number that are a few minutes long or even short. And sadly, there are not that many uploads over thirty minutes long. However, there are plenty that are five minutes to half an hour or so. As I have found, that is hard to find on other ASMR-heavy sites.

The Types Of Titillating Audio Media Runs The Raunchy Gamut

I am used to seeing all sorts of sultry and deviant sex stuff, but the type of content on this site is out of control in the best way possible.

When it comes to specifics, there are plenty ofsexl scenes that focus on all of the flesh slapping against raw flesh, screams, and groans, and the sound of lubricated body parts being jostled about. That is to be expected, but the uploaders (especially the indie erotica makers) take things far further than just producing a soundscape with pornographic content.

In fact, these creators usually make the SFW ASMR that you often find on YouTube but somehow make it as dirty as possible. It truly is impressive, in fact. To give you examples, Arya Grander has made all sorts of sexy vids with her eating and salivating all over ice cream bars, sensually sipping on steaming tea, and other vids with this lovely lady sloppily snacking on all sorts of other treats.

It is probably a good thing that she has done a good job at brushing and flossing her pearly whites, and yes, there are a ton of uploads from her flossing her teeth. She also manages to incorporate giantess fetish freakiness in her vids in a clever way, too.

Belle Blake is more openly sexual as she has uploads of her planting her hungry mouth all over realistic dildos. Panties Queen not only noisily shoves sex toys deep inside of her crevasses but adds to her scenes by writing words like "whore" and other such things on her body.

For those of you who are into BDSM-type entertainment, the channel Anna Devot and Friends has great samples of them crushing eggshells – much like she would on a naughty lad's (or perhaps lass's) gonads. I mentioned Jessica Rabbit FinDom and will again since she has added an impressive number of ASMR meets nymphomaniac and dominatrix porn.

Then there are titles like ASMR sounding: kitchen rubber gloves fetish by Arya Grander. Seriously, look it up, and you will find that this video truly lives up to the name and is, surprisingly, kind of hot. I would even say that, whether or not you are into ASMR, if you like fiery redheads who like to talk dirty, then this sort of content should get your motor running.

And if you like seeing and hearing the sexual moans and other sensual sounds of delight from a naturally big-titted woman, than you will certainly enjoy that video and everything else that this broad has uploaded.

Oddly, some of the most creative and possibly arousing content are women simply reading raunchy text. The uploads by Dirty Words Erotic Audio by Tara Smith is a particularly good example as they don't merely limit their dirty narration of your typical, low-rent erotic literature. Oh, no! They have far kinkier content to pull from. How kinky, you are wondering? Titles include "Haunting Gay Thoughts (Mesmerizing Gay Encouragement)," "This Is Your Life Now (Dysfunctional Masturbation Humiliation)," and Pay It To Porn (Tithe To Tara)."

With titles like that, I think you can probably infer that this uploader appeals to multiple kink categories. But that channel is not the only one – there are plenty of others.

The Search Tools Are Top Tier

By the way, most of the ASMR material on this platform range between five minutes to half an hour and tend to be in high definition or above!

Further, compared to other competitors, this site is great. While PornHub and XVideos have a fine amount of ASMR, it is nice to be able to surf for smut without being bombarded by adverts potentially laden with virtual infections. The only other major platform that can compete with Fap House, I think, is OnlyFans. But even then, it can be tricky to find all of the best ASMR creators with a simple search. Plus, their rates for subscriptions are all over the place.

Having a steady supply of smut is nice and all. But I sometimes think it is easier to get a massive selection of sexual entertainment in one cyber location and pay for what you like instead of a package deal. And the pricing here ain't too bad, either.

There is no standard cost, though I find that most uploaders are not terribly greedy when it comes to how much they charge for a download. Plus, they do take tips which, in my experience, makes one particularly interested in doing custom videos, which I am pretty sure some of these ladies are willing to do.

But you do have to have a Fap House membership. A single monthly, recurring subscription is only $19.99 -- not bad given how huge this library is. Three months is $15.99 a month, which is, in effect, 20% off the month-to-month cost. For even more savings, getting a year package will run you almost $150, but if you think about it, you are spending 40% every thirty days. And finally, a lifetime membership is $299.99 once, and then that's it.

Credit and debit cards from major companies are accepted as well as PayPal. As I have pointed out before, getting an account is super quick.

Like Other Categories, Hot House Delivers The Goods

And I am happy to say that I am pleased with the fact that Fap House has once again outdone itself. I am aware that I mentioned a ton of channels and videos you should check out, and I really think that you should. But those are only a few of them – there was a hell of a lot more that I could have mentioned.

Seriously, this is the severely edited down version of this write-up.

Since that is the case, I think that this should be grounds to give Fap House extra points for their wonderful work. And as there is not much of anything to whine about, I have to say that this is definitely a five-hand fap site. Bully to Fap House for their ASMR uploads, and have fun spilling your load to what they present.

**Okay, you have my permission to click over to Fap House now.**

data.detailedDescription:
DLSite was around for over a decade before ASMR even had a name. I know that sounds like some bullshit I just made up, but the facts speak for themselves: the sprawling online shop was established back in 1996, while Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response only got its permanent name in 2010. The auditory phenomenon has steadily gained traction since its emergence in popular culture, and yeah, that includes the porn scene, too. As we’ll see in a minute here, DLSite has kept up with the trend in a big way.

In case you haven’t scrolled through my other writeups of DLSite.com, I’ll sum it up here: it’s probably the most popular online shops for hentai, doujinshi, and related media like games and audio files. That includes one hell of a hentai-oriented premium ASMR collection, one that I’d wager is the largest of its kind by a huge margin. The site pulls an easy hundred million visits a month, making it about as popular as yours truly. I wonder how many of those weeaboo web surfers are beating off with headphones strapped to their skulls…

Welcome to the Biggest Doujin Shop Ever

The setup makes it slightly more difficult to find the full ASMR section than it needs to be. A search for the term in the search bar brings up over 51,000 results designed to send tingles through your body. DLSite.com isn’t strictly a shopping mall for adults, so about 7,000 of those items are SFW doujins, comics and games. For obvious reasons, I’m not going to be focusing on the All Ages ASMR content in this review.

Another 10,000 of those audio offerings are filed away in DLSite’s Girls’ Side under the Otome and Boys’ Love categories. At the risk of alienating my female readers, I’m not really going to focus on these, either. Sorry, ladies, I just know my audience around here, and I think you do, too. They’re the ones who blow up your Reddit inbox with sad come-ons when they find out you’re a chick who enjoys Naruto as much as they do. (I kid, I kid! I love you guys because you’re perverts like me!)

If you’re anything like me, and I’m betting you are, you’ll be most interested in the ASMR material in the section labeled For Adult Men. They’ve got sensory stimulating doujin, adult comics, H games and smartphone games. The doujins make up the bulk of the selection, with over 41,000 items as of this writing. I hope you’ve got some vacation days saved up and at least a few bucks to spend. If not, it may be time to ask mom to raise your allowance, because your crusty waifu pillow ain’t contributing shit.

A Wide Range of Hentai ASMR

DLSite.com carries a truly impressive range of adult ASMR content. Looking at the stash, it’s easy to forget just how recently this fetish even came into the public consciousness. If you’ve been cranking it to the SFW audio haircuts and ASMR girlfriend experiences on YouTube, you’re in for a sexy treat. You may want to get an old sock ready to catch the mess.

They’ve been selling mass quantities doujins and similar material for decades now, and DLSite wouldn’t be what it is today without a proper interface. There’s a nice set of filters for dialing in your ideal piece of content, ASMR or otherwise. You can select your ideal formats, seek out discounted material, and of course, choose your favorite sex acts and fetishes.

The depravity of the userbase is on clear display in the popular Genres listed in a sidebar menu on the search results page. Visit any random free tube and the popular genres are the usual suspects like Lesbians, Anal, Interracial and 18+ Teens. Hell, find a Western porn comics site or American ASMR library and you’ll likely find a similar set of “vanilla” amateur blowjobs and first-time gangbangs.

DL Site visitors with an ASMR kink, on the other hand, are more into niches like Cuckoldry (Netorare), Pregnancy, Futanari, Monster Girls, and Interspecies Sex. Tentacles in porno are a true rarity outside of hentai, but DL Site has over 17,000 items tagged with the slimy, wriggling appendages. Scatology, Ryona, Hypnosis and Feminization are just a handful of the atypical sex subgenres you’ll find within the archives.

Grab Your Headphones and Find the Perfect Porn

Six hundred might be a drop in the massive DL Site hat, but it’s still a pretty fat collection for a niche as deep as hentai ASMR. The results are initially sorted by popularity, offering up older sister scenarios, afterschool cuddling clubs, lovey-dovey mating elves and a pleasant little something entitled That Gallant Girl Gets Brainhack Corrupted Into A Cumdump Sex Slave.

That last one sounded so fucking kinky that I had to take a closer look. The regular price is a little over eight bucks, but the price drops even lower if you scoop up the free coupons available for new users. It’s surprisingly heavy as far as file size, clocking in at a whopping 3.33 gigs. The audio itself is Japanese, with English and Chinese subtitle files. Again, the Americans might be a little bummed out.

DLSite.com offers a ton of free samples, so I downloaded the 268MB freebie about That Gallant Girl. The Zip file contained half a dozen WAV files, but not the relevant subtitles. The voices and sound effects do sound sexy as hell, though, even if I can’t understand what’s being said. The ASMR response ain’t necessarily triggered by the dialog itself, so this might do the trick nicely, especially with a quality set of headphones.

DL Site also has a point-based rewards system. You rack up digits whenever you make a purchase, offering further incentive to fill up your shopping cart time and time again. I’d tell you how many points I currently have saved up, but I don’t want you to know how much of a depraved masturbator I am. Then again, if you’ve seen my work at MissAVDHCasting, you know I’ll sometimes even stroke my dick with a horny, naked pornstar in the room. A man’s got needs, you know.

DLSite.com is always an easy recommendation for fans of hentai and doujinshi looking for a premium experience straight from Japan. They’ve got an insanely large collection and solid prices, two benefits that carry over to their massive stash of hentai ASMR material. Before taking a closer look today, I’m not sure I would have guessed over 51,000 pieces of such content even exist, but here we are. If the sounds of writhing pseudopods, giggling schoolgirls and breathy whispers make your skin tingle and your dick swell up, I think you’re going to enjoy what you find inside.

data.detailedDescription:
Compared to our porn ancestors, we’re afforded some of the most accessible access to the greatest smut the world has ever seen, and there’s never been a better period of human history to be a porn fanatic. Oh, how lucky we are, my fellow smut enthusiasts!

However, there are few things in life that come with a downside or two, and this easy access to porn is no exception. Sure, we can access 4K porn movies from the smartphone in our pocket, play virtual porn games that engulf you in some of the wildest XXX gaming experiences imaginable, or even make a woman cum from the other side of the world through the use of an interactive sex toy on a live sex cam site, all without leaving our homes, but do you ever start to feel desensitized?

Hell, it’s only normal! Having such flawless access to an insanely varied and sensational collection of modern porn, often for free, can often lead us to overindulge and continue seeking greater thrills that can trump the last. If you’ve ever found yourself in this predicament, I might have the ideal fix for you!

The fix in question requires you to retire your eyes from indulging in visually enthralling porn and use your ears instead. Yep, I’m talking about audio porn! This is a form of smut that requires you to use your imagination, and it can allow you to sink into a truly immersive world of porn that doesn’t leave you in the same dissatisfied predicament as conventional hardcore porn does. In fact, it can provide the perfect respite from it!

Naturally, in the face of visual porn giants, audio porn is still finding its feet. It is still relatively under-discovered by many smut fans worldwide, but I’m working on changing this by bringing you face-to-face with some of the naughtiest audio porn sites that the internet offers. That's precisely what I will be doing today as I introduce you to Rplay.live!

This site is said to provide a filthy audio library of various porn role-playing audios that incorporate all manner of features that’ll have you losing control and spurting cum out of the tip of your dick and your ears! To find out if this is true, I whipped out my ASMR headphones and sank deep into the world of porn audio to see what kind of XXX role-playing audio adventures this site could take me on.

Brave enough to join me? Let’s go!

What is Rplay.live?

After a quick search on Wayback Machine, we see that Rplay.live was founded in 2021. While this makes it a fresh-faced arrival on the scene, it has already built a relatively impressive website and an audio porn collection to match. Speaking of which, let’s see how hard this site can make our ears cum!

What are the Porn Audios Like on Rplay.live?

●    Your Ex-Girlfriend Needs to Talk to You About Something - Holy shit, this filthy audio is enough to make you text your ex! It follows the role playing adventure of a late night call from your slutty ex-girlfriend as she fingers herself and takes you on a trip down memory lane and reminds you of just how good her pussy is! The ASMR in this porn audio is epic!

●    You’ll Be My Finest Servant - if Femdom content sends your cock into a porn spiral, then you can’t afford to miss this XXX audio of a perverted Queen capturing you as her latest slave, and the ASMR ensures no erotic audio details are left unheard!

● ASMR Ear Cleaning - This Hentai bitch has a kink for burying her long tongue in men’s ears and making them cum hands-free from the sensation. Hey, everybody needs a hobby! When you experience this ASMR masterpiece, it might just become your new hobby, too!

Design of the Site

The homepage begins with a hero section that displays some of the most popular audio porn thumbnails in a scrolling window that showcases them really well. On the left is a sidebar with a large login button followed by a vertical menu dedicated to helping people access their user account as it directs you to areas like your channel, playlists, purchased tracks, etc.

Back to the other part of the homepage, we have two columns detailing weekly and daily ranking audio tracks, followed by a list of audio porn creators on the site. Then, various categories of content on the site are displayed in four thumbnails containing metadata covering the title, creator’s name, number of views, likes, and comments, and a tag showing whether the content is free or paid. The titles of these sections range from girlfriend ASMR and random to roleplaying and new content.

At the bottom of the site are two well-designed calls to action that encourage people to become a creator on the site and direct you to the site’s customer support in case you need any assistance.

What I Like Most About it

The site’s design is impeccable, too, and it’s straightforward to navigate without getting overwhelmed. Each track and the accompanying artwork is perfectly displayed and does a great job of encouraging you to click on it and give it a listen.

Some of the best audio content on the site is behind a paywall, but that doesn’t mean there isn’t a substantial amount of free content to be explored. Plus, the site’s admins are generous with giving users free previews of premium tracks to help them decide whether to pull the trigger on paying for it.

What I Don’t Like

Also, I encountered some weird issues while scrolling through the site. My mouse would sometimes move automatically from section to section until it hit the footer. Other times, the homepage would float away when I scrolled to the top of the site. What the fuck?

Suggestions I Have for Rplay.live

The scrolling issue wasn’t permanently there, and I couldn't tell exactly what was causing it. However, when it occurred, it tended to get annoying fast. It’s important not to hinder your user’s browsing experience, so run a test on the site and fix that issue as soon as possible.

Conclusion

data.detailedDescription:
Do you have an ASMR Fantasy you’d love to hear indulged in a pair of headphones? There’s something fucking magical about a woman whispering right into your ears, or hearing her touch herself in high-end binaural audio. If you combine ASMR with good old-fashioned pornography, you can enjoy that manual dick stimulation while getting buzzed by electric tingles and druglike euphoria. ASMRFantasy.com is the first premium ASMR porn site I’ve found, and I’m pretty fucking excited to get in there and start looking around with an expensive set of cans swallowing my ears. The brand was launched as COVID-19 first began forcing us all into hiding, uploading their first audio-enhanced bit of smut in February 2024. For such a new site, they’re getting a shit-ton of attention, with around 3,400 visiting the domain every day. Part of that enthusiasm may just be the novelty of ASMR pornography, but wait until you see the names behind this aural smut-peddling operation.

ASMR Porn from the Smut Peddlers at AdultTime

Which brings us to ASMR Fantasy. To be honest, I expected the first ASMR sex paysite to be some hole in the wall put together by a lone fetishist hiring no-name girls off the church bulletin board. Imagine my surprise when it turned out to be AdultTime, who I’ve mentioned here at MissAVDH more than a few times. The premium porn network is known for putting out good material, and a fucking ton of it.

Those high-quality standards you expect from AdultTime are on display right from the tour page of ASMRFantasy, and it only gets better once you get inside. I think the tour page actually sells them short, because if you don’t recognize Angela White and April ONeil smiling at the camera, you might not realize right away that they’re working with some top-shelf pornstars. AdultTime consistently features some of the hottest names in the business, and their ASMR brand has already showcased slutty, gorgeous girls like Alina Lopez, Kira Noir, and Eliza Ibarra. Jesus fucking Christ, just take my money already!

250+ XXX Channels for the Price of One

Keep your eye out for even better deals, too, because they’re always running specials. I’m reviewing the site early in December, and it looks like they’re running a Black Friday special offering 30-days streaming-only for just five bones. Go slow when you hit that signup page, because sometimes a bot will offer you up to 50% off when you first get there.

You’ve probably already figured it out from my description, but yeah, a membership with download access costs a little more than just streaming. That’s probably the main downside of AdultTime in general, but the main issue a lot of you will have with ASMRFantasy in particular is that it’s only got 6 movies as of this writing. This is balanced out by the fact that AdultTime has over 52,000 videos in the collection. I typed “ASMR” in the search bar and got more than 40 movies back.

On the same note, AdultTime updates at least 8 times a day across the network, but few of those new uploads are part of the ASMRFantasy.com collection. The audio-enhanced porn is more of a niche offering, so the movies come out sort of randomly, with no apparent schedule. They uploaded one last week and another a month before that, but sometimes months pass before another ASMR flick comes out.

High-End Audio, High-End Sluts

There’s a nice mix of scenarios offered in the half-dozen ASMRFantasy movies, and I love how they work typical ASMR tropes into full-on pornos. Angela White gives the viewer a full-body physical exam in their first movie, and they followed that up with a lesbian body massage administered by Alina Lopez. There’s an exotic threesome with Kira Noir and Eliza Ibarra, and the newest one is a MILF fantasy with Silvia Saige.

“Hey you,” whispers Lizzie as the movie opens, the mic picking up all her little mouth noises, breaths and lip smack. “I’m so excited about our date later. I’ve been thinking about it all week. There is one thing that I need help with before we go, if you don’t mind. I’ve been having some trouble picking what outfit to wear. Maybe you can help me.” Don’t mind if I do!

Get Your ASMR Tingles with Full Release

Clips like this really demand a girl with at least some acting chops, because she’s selling the GFE. Lizzie does a fantastic job, enhanced by beautiful brown eye contact with the camera and that incredible smile. It feels intimate as fuck, so when the clothes start coming off, it really feels like she’s doing it just for you. I love the sound of her clothes unbuttoning and slipping off of her skin.

Taking everything off again, she starts rubbing her shaved twat for the camera. You can hear her fingers moving against her girl parts, which make more and more ASMR Fantasy noise as she gets wetter.

Up until now, ASMR smut has been the domain of amateurs shooting home movies on their webcams. It’s a pretty slim library of ASMR-enhanced dirty movies so far, but the collection is rounded out with access to the full, sprawling AdultTime porno network. Check out the cheap trial if you’re not convinced. This one’s a fucking steal.

data.title: Eraudica

data.detailedDescription:
Eraudica is a different type of porn site than the ones I typically review around here at MissAVDH. It’s as sexy, filthy and kinky as I like in my hardcore smut, but unlike most masturbatory content, it ain’t presented in a visual media. It ain’t just another porn story library, either, instead giving you something to jerk off to with a pair of headphones over your ears. Don’t let me tell you how to enjoy it, though: if you want the world to know what gets you going, go ahead and bump that dirty talk and corresponding fuck noises from your car stereo with the windows down.

That’s right, my horny friends, Eraudica.com is a growing archive of sex-positive, male-positive erotic audio. It’s technically a paysite since you’ve got to shell out a few bucks for access to the full catalog, but as we’ll see, there are enough full-length samples that I’d probably call it a freemium joint. However you define it, it may be the most popular collection of its kind, with hundreds of thousands of visitors stopping by every month. Let’s tune in and find out what everybody’s listening to with their dicks out.

Below the site’s logo, Eraudica is described as “Sex positive, male positive erotic audio”. As a professional masturbator and the most respected adult content reviewer in the world, this stood out to me because it’s an unusual angle. I’m a strong advocate of sex positivity, but sites that make it part of their brand tend to be aimed more at a female demographic. Porn stories in general also tend to have a lot more female readers than male, so it’s a double whammy of unexpected pornography.

I made my way to a page introducing newcomers to the site. One of the streaming audio files at the top of the page is a verbal Credo by Eve, the creator of the Eraudica. She explains in detail what she means by male-positive, dropping some filthy terminology as she says it’s alright for dudes to be turned on and enjoy themselves. Hey, I like this chick already!

Another bit of auditory introduction explains what she means by Erotic Audio. “If you think erotic audio is just the soundtrack to a porn video, think again,” Eve says. “It’s so much more than that.” The audio on the site is designed to simulate the intimacy and even the sounds of sex. “You are fully immersed in the scenario as if you were right there with a partner, engaging in the eroticism as well. So much more intimate and personal than merely watching others in a video.”

I’m listening with a nice set of Hifiman Sundara cans strapped over my head, and one of the things I noticed immediately was the very high quality of the recording. Eraudica content is professionally produced and sounds fucking amazing. Eve’s voice is clean and clear, the music and erotic sound effects hovering in just the right background spaces with lovely stereo separation, nothing clashing or obscuring the other elements.

What Are You in the Mood to Hear?

The Non-Erotic audio may not be as dirty as the Erotic stuff, but it’s still deeply sensual. Eve defines this category as “affectionate, cuddly audios meant to help you relax, sleep or just feel appreciated.” You know, kind of like the Girlfriend Experience you can purchase from certain types of adult professionals.
